Package com.versant.event

Interface Summary
ClassEventListener The listener interface for receiving class-based events, typically on a class-based or query-based event channel.
EventTypes Contains integer constants for all of the system-defined event types.
ExceptionListener Interface for a listener that listens for exceptions caused by a server shutdown or kill.
ObjectEventListener The listener interface for receiving object-based events, typically on an object-based or query-based event channel.
TransactionMarkerEventListener The listener interface for receiving transaction begin and end notifications.
UserEventListener The listener interface for user-defined events.
VersantEventListener The base interface for all listeners to event channels.
 

Class Summary
ChannelBuilder Used to specify the properties of a channel.
ClassChannelBuilder Used to specify the properties of a class-based channel.
EventChannel Represents a named event channel.
EventClient The EventClient represents a connection with an "event daemon."
EventMessage An EventMessage instance represents an event message read from the database event message queue.
ObjectChannelBuilder Used to specify the properties of an object-based channel.
QueryChannelBuilder Used to specify the properties of a query-based channel.
VersantEventObject Encapsulates an event that is delivered on an event channel.
 

Exception Summary
ChannelException This runtime exception is thrown when a channel command such as newChannel, delete, enable or disable could not be completed because the event daemon did not complete the channel command and returned a failure status.
